Texts.Chs:
奇怪的，近乎魔法般的具有知觉的构造体。

^orange;食性^reset;：杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:

^orange;增益^reset;:
移动速度^green;+5^reset;%，呼吸时限^green;+200^reset;
抗性：火焰抗性^green;+20^reset;%，寒冷抗性^green;+20^reset;%，毒素抗性^green;+20^reset;%，暗影抗性^green;+20^reset;%，辐射抗性^green;+20^reset;%，射线抗性^green;+40^reset;%
免疫：生物软泥，网，焦油
发光

^orange;武器^reset;:
魔杖：伤害^green;+10^reset;%，防御^green;+5^reset;%
法杖：伤害^green;+15^reset;%，防御^green;+15^reset;%

^red;弱点^reset;:
减益：生命值上限^red;-20^reset;%
抗性：电系抗性^red;-50^reset;%，物理抗性^red;-20^reset;%
Texts.Eng:
Strange near-magical constructs given sentience.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Glow in the Dark
  +^green;5^reset;% Speed
  +^green;200^reset; Breath
  Energy x^green;1.4^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% Fire, Ice, Poison, Shadow, Radioactive. +^green;40^reset;% Cosmic
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Webbing, Black Tar

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Wand: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, Defense x^green;1.05^reset;
  Staff: Damage and Protection x^green;1.15^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.8^reset;
  Hunger Drain +^red;30^reset;%
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;50^reset;% Electric, -^red;20^reset;% Physical
